fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NO. 5, LEVEL 13, LANGHAM PLACE, 8 ARGYLE STREET, MONG KOK, KOWLOON
fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍旺角亞皆老街8號 朗豪坊13樓5號舖

geocode_en.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 旺角亞皆老街8號朗豪坊商場13/F

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 旺角亞皆老街8號朗豪坊商場13/F
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 旺角亞皆老街8號朗豪坊商場13/F
result.name: Beerliner German Bar & Restaurant, Langham Place

reviews.text:
The worst lunch experience, ever.  We ordered beef rib eye as our main course, one is medium, became medium well when serving. One is still a medium rare as I requested.... but the steak is the roughest I had, ever...... eventually, we couldn't eat half at all because it is so rough.
We ordered the drink which included in set lunch when taking order in the beginning, one came 5 minutes after ordered, but another one,,, even dessert as been served, we asked them to follow up.  Eventually, another drink was served 15 minutes after we finished our dessert.
Sorry to say, we will not come back again as we had unacceptable food and service.

Good prices for being at the top of a shopping mall. Also the portion sizes are very large and more than make up for the price. 

Definitely try the bread bowl for the pretzel and the pork knuckle wrap. 

Obviously brats and sauerkraut are a must. 

If you are an American missing some good beer and brats, definitely stop in.

Love the atmosphere there, the truffle fries are really good, the steak is nice and tender. The suckling pig is the best dish there, it is SO JUICY. Service there are good. Recommended for couples and friends to hang out there. The beer is also pretty good

Lunch at Beerliner and taste the homemade sausage,  the set lunch was good enough with appetizers and desert, of course, drink included. We ordered a main of fish with Spanish rice. We all satisfied with the set lunch. Moreover, we also got a receipt for parking and we hot two hours.
Great service and environment. Nice lunch with colleagues. Pork belly slider was the best!

result.vicinity: 13/F, 朗豪坊商場, 8 亞皆老街, 旺角

Beerlin¿¿¿ Ger¿¿¿ Bar & Restaurant, Langham Place
完全係不拿知所謂，七個人去， 得兩張大枱話要等1.5小時先有位，3-4人細枱多的是，但話唔可以泊台，就算鄰近兩張都話唔得，只能夠一張喺入面一張喺出面。正佢老尾，永世都唔會去！
